content.rendered:
Air Corsica (formerly CCM Airlines), is a French regional airline with its head office on the grounds of Ajaccio – Campo dell’Oro Airport in Ajaccio, Corsica, France. It operates passenger services from Corsica to continental France.

 

Air Corsica Address:
  Aéroport Napoléon-Bonaparte, 20090 Ajaccio, France

 Air Corsica Support email: support-commercial@aircorsica.com

Air Corsica Customer care

For any queries or complaints on your flights, baggage, bookings, insurance, car, reservation, special assistance, call

Air corsica customer care number 0809 10 11 05, 0825 35 35 35

(0.20cts / min from Monday to Friday, from 8am to 12pm)

Air Corsica Claim form: https://www.aircorsica.com/sites/default/files/inline-files/formulaire-de-reclamation-air-corsica.pdf

Air Corsica Internet support number: 0825 35 35 35

(0,20cts / min 7 days out of 7, from 8h to 20h).

Air Corsica Press related / Partnership enquiries

Email to Air Corsica Communication Department at: mececchi@aircorsica.com

Air Corsica Job / career: recrutement@aircorsica.com .

To get the refund at Air Corsica

For any refund request, send mail to reimbursements@aircorsica.com

Air Corsica Official website: https://www.aircorsica.com/

Air Corsica Online Check-in: www.Air Corsica.com/in/gb/online check-in

NoteWeb Check-in is 30 hours up to 30 minutes before the flight

Check Air Corsica schedule here: www.Air Corsica.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Air Corsica flight status here: www.Air Corsica.com/in/gb/flight status

Air Corsica Baggage Allowance

Air Corsica Baggage

View Air Corsica Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Air Corsica Baggage enquiries

For any information or queries on baggage delay, cancellation of the flight or any compensation for your loss or You want to obtain the invoice of an airline ticket, a cancellation invoice or a certificate of delay, send your complaint in a mail to serviceclientele@aircorsica.com

Travel during Pregnancy in Air Corsica

Expectant mother can travel until the end of pregnancy and they should provide a medical certificate stated that they are fit to travel.

Air Corsica Freight Service

Air Corsica Freight Office in Ajaccio

AJACCIO Air Freight Service
Napoleon Bonaparte Airport
Freight Zone – 20090 Ajaccio

 +33 (0) 4 95 23 56 40
Fax: +33 (0) 4 95 20 93 94
Email: afs.aja@wanadoo.fr

Working hours
Monday to Friday: 8:00 to 12:30; 13:30 to 23:00
Saturdays from 8h00 to 12h30 and from 15h00 to 19h00

Air Corsica Freight Office in Borgo

BASTIA Casinc Air Freight
Bastia Poretta Airport
Freight Airport – 20290 Borgo

+33 (0) 4 95 36 03 63
Fax: +33 (0) 4 95 38 37 51

Email: casincairfret@orange.fr

Working hours
Monday to Friday from 8h00 to 12h30 and from 14h00 to 23h00
Saturdays from 8h00 to 13h00 and from 14h00 to 19h00

Air Corsica Freight Office in Marignane

MARSEILLE WFS – France Handling
Marseille Provence
Freight Airport – BP32 – 13728 Marignane

+33 (0) 4 42 46 77 04
Fax: +33 (0) 4 42 46 77 01
Email: exploit.mrs@wfs.aero

Working hours
Monday to Saturday from 6 am to 8 pm

Air Corsica Freight Office in Nice

NICE WFS – France Handling
Nice Côte d’Azur Airport
Freight Area – 06281 Nice Cedex 03

+33 (0) 4 93 21 45 50
Fax: +33 (0) 4 93 21 45 51
Email: nceexp@wfs.aero

Working hours
Monday to Friday from 06h00 to 20h00
Saturdays from 06h00 to 14h00

Air Corsica Freight Office in Paris

PARIS ORLY – Worldwide Flight Services / SFS
Heart of Orly
Cargo Zone
Building 250 – Hall A
Silk Street – Commercial Center
94392 Orly Terminal Cedex

+33 1 70 03 31 58, + 33 1 70 03 30 47
Email: oryafc@wfs.aero

Working hours
09:00 to 18:00

Air Corsica Freight Office in Paris Airport

PARIS CDG – Worldwide Flight Services / France Handling
Paris Airport Charles De Gaulle
Building B0 – Cargo 5
10, rue du Pavé
95706 Roissy CDG

+33 1 70 03 83 11
Fax: +33 1 48 16 48 33

Working hours
Monday to Friday from 06h00 to 20h00
Saturdays from 06h00 to 14h00

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Corsica

Total fleet: 10

ATR 42/72

  • ATR 72

Airbus A319

  • Airbus A319-100

Airbus A320

  • Airbus A320-200

 Queries handled by Air Corsica Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Corsica type Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Corsica: (click on the stars below)
